notes:
### v1.2.37
#### NEW FEATURES
- added option to alternate background colors in breakdown for better readability (General > Split Lines, on by default)
- added chart options to hide all lines in legend
#### BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
- added tooltips to show raw damage dealt
- fixed some issues with fonts
full patch notes on github
please report bugs on discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
